flawed_nl_solution:
After the accident, Mike can only type 65 words/minute - 20 words/minute = <<65-20=45>>45 words/minute.
So, he will be able to finish typing the document in 810 words / 45 words/minute = <<810/45=81.0>>81.0 minutes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18.0, not 81.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
